title: Watch: President Trump trolls France’s Emmanuel Macron over unemployment rates – twitchy.com
text:
When people say we knew what we were getting when we voted for Donald Trump in 2016, they’re almost right: We knew we were getting a master of trolling, but we had no idea just how good he was at it.

Here’s Trump giving his theory to a French reporter on why United States unemployment numbers are so low while France’s are so high:

French reporter: You have very low unemployment rate in the US and we have very high unemployment rate in France. How come? What the recipe for? President Trump: Well, maybe we have a better President than you do 💥😂 pic.twitter.com/lFLfnVTOSg — Wojciech Pawelczyk 🇵🇱🇺🇸 (@PolishPatriotTM) October 17, 2019

Not gonna lie: We love the still frame at the end of Trump smiling — so many can’t see him as anything other than an orange-hued tyrant, but the dude’s funny. Plus, Emmanuel Macron deserved it.

Most honest politician of all time. — Burt Macklin (@agent_macklin_) October 19, 2019

You got to love him!😂😂 — Stephanie Holey (@Steveelee67) October 19, 2019

I watched this like 30 times and it’s STILL amazing and hilarious. — Lau Lau (@Laura_says_what) October 19, 2019

Never gets old…😂 — psycac (@yocam6364) October 19, 2019

I just LOVE him. — Karl Grimm (@Karlgrimm48) October 19, 2019

So true. And I'm french — kenbarney (@cyrilgoku) October 19, 2019

Lol this is gold 😂👌 — 🍒 Jalissa Jenay 🍒 (@icyy_kisses_) October 19, 2019

He needs to carry a pair of sunglasses that he puts on when he says things like this. — Bookshelf Q. Battler (@bookshelfbattle) October 19, 2019

The best 🤣💪🏻🇺🇸 — Avni (@Shqipe67) October 19, 2019

Straight gangsta… lmfaooooo — Deekons (@TravisBevelaqua) October 19, 2019

I've seen this video 3 or 4 times. Never get tired of it. 😊 — Robert Mackay (@officialrmackay) October 19, 2019

A must watch video America 😂. — Rep.patrick Ramirez (@ReppatrickRami5) October 19, 2019

Love how Pres Trump just says what he’s thinking! 🤣 — Jill W (@JillW10) October 19, 2019

Just one of the MANY campaign promises he delivered on!! He ALWAYS knows what to say too!!😁 TRUMP 2020!!! — Lisa Druckenmiller (@LisaDruckenmil2) October 19, 2019

His popularity is due to the fact that this man…LOVES TO BE HATED. — Cubb (@CubKollar) October 19, 2019

That’s an interesting theory.

Funny answer. The correct answer is that America has less government regulations and laws than France does and that it is more capitalistic than France. — Jared A. (@JaredAllebest) October 19, 2019

Funny joke, but it might be true w/all those leftists in France. — Ken Lukasiewicz (@kenluke) October 19, 2019

Exit zinger:

One question Obama would have never been asked! — Reddog5772 (@Reddog57721) October 19, 2019

Related:
description: President Trump gives France some advice on reducing unemployment; Elect a better president.
